verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6767>shadowing<s%> with <S%H3671>wings<s%>, which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>:

That <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> <S%H6735>ambassadors<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, even in <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H1573>bulrushes<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, saying, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, ye <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H4900>scattered<s%> and <S%H4178>peeled<s%>, to a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> from their beginning <S%H1973>hitherto<s%>; a <S%H1471>nation<s%> meted <S%H6978>out<s%> and trodden <S%H4001>down<s%>, whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> have <S%H958>spoiled<s%>!

All ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and <S%H7931>dwellers<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H7200>see<s%> ye, when he lifteth <S%H5375>up<s%> an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; and when he <S%H8628>bloweth<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye.

For <S%H3541>so<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, I will take my <S%H8252>rest<s%>, and I will <S%H5027>consider<s%> in my dwelling <S%H4349>place<s%> like a <S%H6703>clear<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> upon <S%H216>herbs<s%>, and like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.

For <S%H6440>afore<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, when the <S%H6525>bud<s%> is <S%H8552>perfect<s%>, and the sour <S%H1155>grape<s%> is <S%H1580>ripening<s%> in the <S%H5328>flower<s%>, he shall both cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2150>sprigs<s%> with pruning <S%H4211>hooks<s%>, and take <S%H5493>away<s%> and cut <S%H8456>down<s%> the <S%H5189>branches<s%>.

They shall be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> unto the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> shall <S%H6972>summer<s%> upon them, and all the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H2778>winter<s%> upon them.

Â¶ In that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall the <S%H7862>present<s%> be <S%H2986>brought<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4900>scattered<s%> and <S%H4178>peeled<s%>, and from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> from their beginning <S%H1973>hitherto<s%>; a <S%H1471>nation<s%> meted <S%H6978>out<s%> and trodden under <S%H4001>foot<s%>, whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> have <S%H958>spoiled<s%>, to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
